Introduction.title: My name is Alejandro.
Introduction.text: And my passion is CREATING. Creating anything: furniture, stories, photographs, dishes, songs... But I get paid to create WEB APPS. So I create them. Because I'm good at them. Not just that. I put my whole SOUL into it. And this is how I live creating. And I'm happy. I wake up every day with a smile.

PassionSection.smile: And you... what makes you smile?
